abstract: “If I were, not president, but if I were king in America, I would abolish all teachers’ lounges where they sit together and worry how woe is us.” — John Kasich, at an education forum in New Hampshire.

headline.main: Verbatim: John Kasich Takes On Teachers’ Attitudes

snippet: “If I were, not president, but if I were king in America, I would abolish all teachers’ lounges where they sit together and worry how woe is us.” — John Kasich, at an education forum in New Hampshire.
